changelog.changes:
• - Trustpilot plugin automates review requests — a new order automatically triggers an invitation email to your customer.
  • - Configure 'Invitation trigger' option. You will be able to configure what triggers the Invitations to be sent to your customers - when order is confirmed or when order is completed.
  • - Send review invitations to your past customers. Automatically invite customers from the past 7 days up to 6 months ago.
  • - Showcase your reviews - add multiple TrustBox widgets to your webshop. Drag and drop TrustBoxes for an instant preview, rearrange, customize, and publish without code changes.

plugin.description:
Trustpilot-reviews

With the Trustpilot Integration for your store, you can automatically collect reviews, integrate trust widgets into your webshop and use reviews for marketing and SEO optimization.

Trustpilot-reviews

Mit der Trustpilot Integration, können Sie automatisch Bewertungen sammeln, Trust-Widgets in Ihren Webshop einbinden und Bewertungen für Marketing und SEO-optimierung nutzen.
